/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a curved street lamp, which is located on the left side of the frame. The sky above is filled with clouds, creating a somewhat gloomy atmosphere. The street itself is lined with trees and buildings, adding depth to the scene. In the distance, a construction site can be seen, indicating ongoing development in the area. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the overcast sky and the lush vegetation respectively.
